name: Roll The Dice (Zer0)
description:
Summary

You take control of a die, that is rolling out of control on a board game, you have to dodge all the objects on the board

Note

This is a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022, the theme is Roll of the Dice

The volume may be high, and bugs may be present, stay cautious

Credits

Dodo - Main director, sfx, music, artist 

Zer0 - Artist, concept-art 

333lol - Programming 

Markimoo - co-artist 

RudyStudios - tester

Controls
